title: Oblivion Game of the Year Edition
description:
Oblivion Game of the Year Edition

XBOX360  - USA, EUROPE, AUSTRALIA
Language - English


Developer - Bethesda Softworks
Publisher - Bethesda Game Studios

Release Date - Sep 10-2007


Format - 
    Disc 1 - .iso and .dvd
    Disc 2 - .iso and .dvd
    Prima Official Strategy Guide - .pdf

Stealth - Yes


Oblivion GotY allows players who have never played the 2006 Game of the Year to experience Oblivion for the first time with additional content. In addition, gamers can continue their existing games of Oblivion and experience the new quests and areas offered by the expansion and downloadable content.

Oblivion GotY includes the original version of the award-winning RPG Oblivion along with the official expansion, The Elder Scrolls IV: Shivering Isles, and the downloadable content, Knights of the Nine. 	


This game is stealth patched and the torrent includes the .iso and .dvd files

I have tested these files on the 1.51 firmware and verified stealth through two softwares.

Just open the .dvd file in a common mounting tool and burn (2.4x) and you'll be playing in no time.





***************************************************************************
INSTALL DISC 2 TO YOUR HDD IF YOU WANT THE EXPANSION DATA, DISC 1 WILL JUST BE THE ORIGINAL OBLIVION
***************************************************************************





REMEMBER TO SEED!!!!! Everyone deserves a go at this awesome game
